STATE
v.
GOMEZ. No. COA07-636. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed February 5, 2008. Certification Date February 25, 2008. Appeal from Wake (05CRS100015, 05CRS100016, 05CRS100017, 05CRS100018, 05CRS100256, 05CRS100258, 05CRS100259).

Cases reported without published opinion. No error in part; remanded in part.
